cast.name: 克里格波·马萨亚瓦尼奇 Krirkphol Masayavanich
西里亚空·普卡韦什 Siriyakorn Pukkavesh
桑提苏克·普罗姆斯利 Santisuk Promsiri
萨克拉特·鲁克塔姆容 Sakrat·Ruekthamrong

director.name: M·L·蓬德菲尼普·杜瓦库 M.L. Pundhevanop Dhewakul

introduction: Kaew is a slave in the late 1800′s Thailand under King Chulalongkorn’s reign during the Chakri dynasty. He grows up during a time when slavery is coming to an end in Thailand. Kaew is what you would call a grandfathered slave meaning in all technicality he is a slave because his parents were slaves. He essentially inherited the disposition of being a slave. Society was changing, new laws were put inplace that would allow Kaew to retire from slavery at 21. However, his master (creditor), Phraya Chaiyakorn refused to free him. The story centers around Kaew, his struggle for freedom and the love he has for Namthip, the young noble woman who is the daughter of his master and the heart of his inner strength.
